properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      02-50.69S 037-12.78W AND 03-37.73S 037-48.97W.
   B. 29 NOV ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      02-54.01S 037-08.51W AND 03-41.32S 037-44.91W.
   C. 30 NOV ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      02-57.33S 037-04.24W AND 03-45.06S 037-40.96W.
   D. 01 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      03-00.65S 036-59.97W AND 03-48.96S 037-37.13W.
   E. 02 DEC ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      03-03.96S 036-55.70W AND 03-52.86S 037-33.30W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 03 DEC 12.
